菜单介绍¶

1.1 File¶

File菜单下包括下列功能：

  1. Open Map

  2. Open Recent

  3. Close Map

  4. Add Raster Layer

  5. Add Vector Layer

  6. Save

  7. Save as

  8. Export

  9. Exit

1.2 Plot¶

Plot菜单包括下列功能：

  1. Create layer

  2. Leveling Displacement

  3. GNSS　Displacement

  4. Focal Mechanism

  5. GNSS Time Series

  6. GNSS Velocity Profile

  7. Leveling Displacement Profile

  8. Raster Data Profile

  9. Ratation Rate

  10. Principal Strain Rate

  11. Coseismic Slip Distribution

  12. Interseismic Coupling Model

  13. CFS Change on Fault Plane

  14. L/U Curve

  15. Depth Profile of EQs

  16. Temporal Variation of EQs

1.3 Tools¶

Tools菜单包括下列功能：

  1. Construct Fault Geometry

  2. Create Checkboard Test Model

  3. Construct Deep Slip Model

  4. Extract EQs Within a Block

  5. Extract Leveling Data Within a Block

  6. Extract GNSS Data Within a Block

  7. Extract InSAR Data Within a Block

  8. Extract Elevation Data

  9. Extract Incidence/Azimuth Angle

  10. Extract cGNSS Coseismic Displacement

  11. Gauss Projection: EN2XY

  12. Gauss Projection: XY2EN

  13. Reference Frame Conversion

  14. Data Format Conversion

  15. Superimpose Images

  16. Extract Fault Segment Parameters

  17. Compress Image

  18. Clip Images

1.4 Analysis¶

Analysis菜单包括下列功能：

  1. Calculate Min/Max Values

  2. Calculate Total Seismic Moment

  3. Compare GNSS/InSAR Displacement

  4. Estimate Observation Standard Deviation

  5. Correlation between Seismicity and Faults

  6. Correlation between Seismicity and Stressing Rates

  7. Correlation between Aftershocks and CFS Change

  8. Fit Interseismic GNSS Time Series

  9. Correct Postseimic GNSS Time Series

  10. Fit Postseimic GNSS Time Series

  11. Fit Temporal Distribution Of Aftershocks

  12. Fit GNSS Velocities

1.5 Forward¶

Forward菜单包括下列功能：

  1. Forward CoGrnd displacement

  2. Forward CoRegn Sts Change

  3. Forward Fault Co Sts Perturb

  4. Forward Post Ground displacement

  5. Forward Post Regn Sts Change

  6. Forward Fault Post Sts Perturb

  7. Forward Post Dis Poroelastic Rebound

  8. Forward Post Stress Poroelastic Rebound

  9. Forward Inter Grnd Dis

  10. Forward Inter Sts Accumulation

  11. Forward Tectonic Loading NS

  12. Forward Tectonic Loadind DS

  13. Forward Lyr Grn Function

1.6 Invert¶

Invert菜单包括下列功能：

  1. InvertFlt

  2. Invert CoSlip Distribution

  3. Invert Blc Motion And Stn

  4. Invert Reg Tec Stn

  5. Invert Reg Tec Stn LSC

  6. Invert Back Slip Rate

  7. Invert Back Slip Rate 3DEM

  8. Invert Back Slip Rate 3DVM

  9. Invert Stressing Rate

  10. Slip Distribution

1.7 Evaluate¶

Evaluate菜单包括下列功能：

  1. Count Seismic Moment

  2. Ocurrence Possibility

  3. After shock Duration

  4. Assess Earthquake OccurTime

  5. Stress Disturb Time

1.8 Layer¶

Layer菜单包括下列功能：

  1. Add Ground Point Layer

  2. Add GMT Lines Layer

  3. Add GNSS Layer

  4. Add Leveling Layer

  5. Add Principal Strain Layer

  6. Add Rotation Rate Layer

  7. Add Focal Mechanism Layer

  8. Remove Layer

1.9 Help¶

Help菜单包括下列功能：

  1. Help Document

  2. About QTGA
